OOC: You'll have quite a big update do when "the right time" comes!

:::Sharpedge/Jetstorm:::

::Sharpedge puts up his non-spinner arm and blocks the fireball. It burned 
his arm.  he blocks the sword missle with his sword.  he fires 1 missle at 
Pyro and 1 Demon Wulf.  Jetstorm blocks the sphere with wing.  A few optic 
blasts hit Jetstorms hoverer.  The laser shots hit Jetstorm in the shoulders. 
 He fires 13 enrgy blasts at Dark Claw, 12 at Chaos, and 25 rapid fire optic 
blasts at Minion::
